languages.text: "Прячусь". {n}Девочка немного медлит.{/n} "Я думала, что буду плакать, и не хочу, чтобы кто-то увидел. Я... меня зовут Аделия Беллардо. Это мой дедушка там, в ящике".
"Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."
languages.original_text: "Прячусь". {n}Девочка немного медлит.{/n} "Я думала, что буду плакать, и не хочу, чтобы кто-то увидел. Я... меня зовут Аделия Беллардо. Это мой дедушка там, в ящике".

traits.locale_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa there, in the box."
"Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa there, in the box."
"Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."
"Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."
"Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

languages.text: “我在躲着。”{n}她犹豫了一会儿，开了口。{/n}“我觉得我要哭出来了，我不希望任何人看到。我……我叫阿德莉雅·贝拉多，盒子里面的那个人是我爷爷。”
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: “我在躲着。”{n}她犹豫了一会儿，开了口。{/n}“我觉得我要哭出来了，我不希望任何人看到。我……我叫阿德莉雅·贝拉多，盒子里面的那个人是我爷爷。”

languages.text: «Esconderme». {n}Duda por un momento.{/n} «Pensé que iba a llorar y no quería que nadie me viera. Soy... mi nombre es Adelia Bellardo. El que está ahí, en la caja, es mi abuelo».
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: «Esconderme». {n}Duda por un momento.{/n} «Pensé que iba a llorar y no quería que nadie me viera. Soy... mi nombre es Adelia Bellardo. El que está ahí, en la caja, es mi abuelo».

languages.text: 「隠れてるの」{n}彼女は束の間躊躇する。{/n}「泣きそうになったんだけど、誰にも見られたくなかったから。私...私の名前は…アデリア・ベラルド。箱に入ってるのは私のおじいちゃんよ」
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: 「隠れてるの」{n}彼女は束の間躊躇する。{/n}「泣きそうになったんだけど、誰にも見られたくなかったから。私...私の名前は…アデリア・ベラルド。箱に入ってるのは私のおじいちゃんよ」

languages.text: "Ich verstecke mich." {n}Sie zögert einen Moment.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich muss weinen, und wollte nicht, dass es jemand sieht. Ich ... mein Name ist Adelia Bellardo. Der da in der Kiste ist mein Opa."
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstecke mich." {n}Sie zögert einen Moment.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich muss weinen, und wollte nicht, dass es jemand sieht. Ich ... mein Name ist Adelia Bellardo. Der da in der Kiste ist mein Opa."

languages.text: « Je me cache. » {n}Elle marque une hésitation.{/n} « Je pensais que j'allais pleurer et je ne voulais pas qu'on me voie. Je... Je m'appelle Adélia Bellardo. C'est mon grand-père, là, dans le cercueil. »
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: « Je me cache. » {n}Elle marque une hésitation.{/n} « Je pensais que j'allais pleurer et je ne voulais pas qu'on me voie. Je... Je m'appelle Adélia Bellardo. C'est mon grand-père, là, dans le cercueil. »

languages.text: "Saklanıyorum." {n}Bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Ağlayacağımı düşündüm, kimsenin beni ağlarken görmesini istemedim. Ben... Adım Adelia Bellardo. Tabuttaki adam benim dedem."
languages.original_text: "Hiding." {n}She hesitates for a moment.{/n} "I thought I was going to cry, and I didn't want anyone to see. I... my name is Adelia Bellardo. It's my grandpa in there, in the box."

traits.locale_text: "Saklanıyorum." {n}Bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Ağlayacağımı düşünmüştüm ve kimsenin beni ağlarken görmesini istemedim. Ben... Benim adım Adelia Bellardo. O kutunun içindeki adam, benim dedem."
